| HistoryText             = After the [[Kl'rt (Earth-616)|Super-Skrull]]'s thefts were blamed on the [[Fantastic Four (Earth-616)|Fantastic Four]],{{r|Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur Vol 1 25|26}} and [[Galan (Earth-616)|Galactus]] warned of [[Omnipotentis (Multiverse)|Omnipotentis]]' approach,{{r|Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur Vol 1 27}} the [[Jonathan Storm (Earth-616)|Human Torch]] and the [[Benjamin Grimm (Earth-616)|Thing]] united with [[Lunella Lafayette (Earth-616)|Moon Girl]] to protect the [[Earth-616|Prime Marvel Universe]] from both threats, and clear the Fantastic Four's name.{{r|Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur Vol 1 27}} After an exhaustive search for the perfect teammate to help them defeat the Super-Skrull,{{r|Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur Vol 1 28}} they finally expanded into the new Fantastic Four.{{r|Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur Vol 1 29}}
